headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Capture Week: Get Double GTA$ & RP Capture Bonuses, 'Meltdown' Tee, Discounts and More
content:
Go all out for the contested hardware in Capture Jobs this week and earn Double RP. There's also a huge range of discounted items available all this week, including cut-rate Gold Luxor Deluxe and Kurumas (both standard and armored), select car mods, ammo and clothing.

As part of Capture Week you've also unlocked an exclusive 'Meltdown' t-shirt, which can be found in your wardrobe.

Check out rockstargames.com/newswire for all the details.
